means: Supersonic High Altitude Parachute Experiment 超音速高空降落伞试验

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"形式"或"外形"之意。
means: form ： 最普通用词，含义广，既可指客观物体的外形，又可用于抽象概念的"形"。
figure ： 指轮廓、外形，尤指体态，相貌或身体。
shape ： 通常指由线和面所围成的外观上的形，侧重立体形状。
outline ： 指任何形状的轮廓线。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使成形"之意。
means: mould ： 通常指把有延展性的材料浇铸或塑成所需形状的物品。
forge ： 意义较窄，指用锤子和砧对金属材料进行加工或锻造。
form ： 通常指对尚未成形的物品作进一步加工，使成为成品。
shape比mould使用广泛，指用许多不同的方法制成不同形状的制品。

word_mean: 日间悬挂在船上规定的易见处， 用以表示船舶动态和作业状态，具有特定形状和颜色的几何体。

sentence.Network_en: The shirt's cuffs won't sag and lose their shape after washing.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件衬衫的袖口洗后照样挺括，不变形。

sentence.Network_en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentence.Network_cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentence.Network_en: Britain needs new leadership if she is to help shape Europe's future.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果英国想要对欧洲未来的发展产生重要影响的话，就需要新的领导层。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 钻石的形状（SHAPE）是指其正确轮廓亦即腰围层的形状，如：圆形、橄榄形、方形…等。钻石的切磨（CUT）它是钻石4C的第一个…
新目标英语八年级下册单词表_百度文库 ... human 人类 shape 外形 huge 巨大的.
3DMAX 快捷键大全 ... (Helpers) 辅助物体 (shapes) 图形 (Lights) 灯光.
“形（Shape）”是AutoCAD中一种特殊的图形对象，其用法类似于块，但与块相比，形的图形构成较简单，但其所占用空间较小，且绘 …

list.abs: 数据整形（shaping）--缓存数据，以获得稳定的流速，如果发生拥塞，一般不丢弃数据包。数据整治（policing）--使数据流满足合约 …
Instrumentation· 目的：清除感染（感染的有机物、无机物、根管壁）、根管成形（shaping）· 要求：彻底清除感染的牙髓组织；扩挫感染的根管壁；反复大量的根管冲洗；避免刺激尖周正常组织。.
change的翻译中... ... simple harmonic periodic change 简谐周期变化 shape change 形变 solid -state phase changes 固态相变.
【外语】汽车英语词汇_中国客车论坛_汽车_西祠胡同 ... 牛头刨床 shaper 牛头刨床 shaping machine 农用运输车 agriculture truck.

phrase.cizu_name: get into shape (或get someone into shape)

jx.jx_en_mean: become (or make someone) physically fitter by exercise

lj.lj_ly: if you're thinking of getting into shape, take it easy and build up slowly.
lj.lj_ls: 如果你想让身体健康，那就放松一点，慢慢锻炼。

jx.jx_en_mean: in any manner or under any circumstances (used for emphasis)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 以任何形式；在各种情况之下（用于强调）

lj.lj_ly: 96 per cent of the electorate voted against Europeanization in any shape or form.
lj.lj_ls: 96%的选民投票反对任何形式的欧洲一体化。

lj.lj_ly: retribution arrived in the shape of my irate father.
lj.lj_ls: 父亲勃然大怒，这就是我受到的惩罚。

phrase.cizu_name: lick (或 knock 或 whip) someone/thing into shape

jx.jx_en_mean: act forcefully to bring someone or something into a fitter, more efficient, or better-organized state
jx.jx_cn_mean: （用强力）把…训练好；把…整顿好；使像样

lj.lj_ly: the bank was eager to whip the company into shape for eventual sale.
lj.lj_ls: 这家银行急着要大力整顿好这家公司，以便最终出售。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of an object) not having its usual or original shape, especially after being bent or knocked
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指物体弯曲或撞击后）变形；变样

lj.lj_ly: check that the pipe end and compression nut are not bent out of shape.
lj.lj_ls: 检查确认管子末端和压缩螺帽并未弯曲变形。

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a person) in poor physical condition; unfit

phrase.cizu_name: the shape of things to come

jx.jx_en_mean: the way the future is likely to develop
(informal, chiefly N. Amer.)used as an ultimatum to someone to improve their performance or behaviour or face being made to leave
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，主北美)表现好一点，否则滚蛋

jx.jx_en_mean: assume a distinct form; develop into something definite or tangible

lj.lj_ly: the past few months have seen the state's health insurance legislation begin to take shape.
lj.lj_ls: 国家医疗保险立法在过去几个月中开始成形。

jx.jx_en_mean: To improve so as to meet a standard

lj.lj_ly: Either shape up or ship out.
lj.lj_ls: 如果不好好干就请你走人

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gesceap 'external form', also 'creation', sceppan 'create', of Germanic origin

entry.def: The shape of an object, a person, or an area is the appearance of their outside edges or surfaces, for example whether they are round, square, curved, or fat.

example.ex: Each mirror is made to order and can be designed to almost any shape or size.
example.tran: 每面镜子都是定制的，几乎可以设计成任何形状和尺寸。

example.ex: ...little pens in the shape of baseball bats...
example.tran: 棒球棒形状的小钢笔

entry.def: You can refer to something that you can see as a shape if you cannot see it clearly, or if its outline is the clearest or most striking aspect of it.

example.ex: The great grey shape of a tank rolled out of the village...
example.tran: 一个坦克的巨大灰影从村子里开了出来。

example.ex: Lying in bed we often see dark shapes of herons silhouetted against the moon.
example.tran: 躺在床上,我们常看到月光映衬下鹭的黑色身影。

entry.def: A shape is a space enclosed by an outline, for example a circle, a square, or a triangle.

example.ex: ...if you imagine a sort of a kidney shape...
example.tran: 如果你想象出一种类似肾脏的形状

example.ex: He suggested that the shapes represented a map of Britain and Ireland.
example.tran: 他暗示这些图形象征了英国和爱尔兰的地图。

entry.tran: (计划或组织的)框架，结构，特点，形式
entry.def: The shape of something that is planned or organized is its structure and character.

example.ex: The last two weeks have seen a lot of talk about the future shape of Europe...
example.tran: 在过去的两周里有很多关于欧洲未来格局的讨论。

example.ex: Ultimately, we can change the shape of people's lives.
example.tran: 最终，我们可以改变人们的生活状况。

entry.tran: 决定…的形成;影响…的发展
entry.def: Someone or something that shapes a situation or an activity has a very great influence on the way it develops.

example.ex: Christian Democratic leaders are meeting to discuss their role in shaping the future of Europe...
example.tran: 基督教民主党的领袖们正在会晤讨论他们在影响欧洲未来格局的过程中将要扮演的角色。

example.ex: Like it or not, our families shape our lives and make us what we are.
example.tran: 无论喜欢与否，家庭影响了我们的生活，决定了我们成为什么样的人。

entry.def: If you shape an object, you give it a particular shape, using your hands or a tool.

example.ex: Cut the dough in half and shape each half into a loaf.
example.tran: 将生面团一切为二，再分别揉成长条形。

example.ex: ...machinery for shaping the plutonium core of nuclear weapons.
example.tran: 制造核武器钚核心的机器

entry.tran: 开端;先河;未来发展模式
entry.def: If you say that something is the shape of things to come, you mean that it is the start of a new trend or development, and in future things will be like this.

example.ex: British Rail says its new Liverpool Street station is the shape of things to come.
example.tran: 英国铁路公司声称最新的利物浦街道车站是未来的发展方向。

entry.def: If you say, for example, that you will not accept something in any shape or form, or in any way, shape or form, you are emphasizing that you will not accept it in any circumstances.

example.ex: I don't condone violence in any shape or form...
example.tran: 我不能容忍任何形式的暴力。

example.ex: There is absolutely no reason for consumers to be panicking in any way, shape or form.
example.tran: 顾客们绝对没有理由产生任何形式的恐慌。

entry.tran: (身体)状况良好/状况不佳;(事物)情况良好/情况糟糕
entry.def: If someone or something is in shape, or in good shape, they are in a good state of health or in a good condition. If they are in bad shape, they are in a bad state of health or in a bad condition.

example.ex: ...the Fatburner Diet Book, a comprehensive guide to getting in shape...
example.tran: 《燃脂塑型饮食指南》，保持身体健康的综合性指南

example.ex: He was still in better shape than many young men...
example.tran: 他仍然比很多年轻人都要健康。

entry.tran: (精确说明所指)以…的形式,也就是
entry.def: You can use in the shape of to state exactly who or what you are referring to, immediately after referring to them in a general way.

example.ex: The Prime Minister found a surprise ally today in the shape of Jacques Delors, the Commission President...
example.tran: 首相今天发现了一个令他意外的盟友，即欧洲委员会主席雅克·德洛尔。

example.ex: What industry needed now was a little hope in the shape of an interest-rate cut.
example.tran: 工业目前只希望可以削减利率。

entry.def: If you lick ,knock, or whip someone or something into shape, you use whatever methods are necessary to change or improve them so that they are in the condition that you want them to be in.

example.ex: You'll have four months in which to lick the recruits into shape...
example.tran: 你将有4个月的时间把这些新兵训练出来。

example.ex: Few people doubt his ability to whip the economy into shape.
example.tran: 几乎无人怀疑他整顿经济的能力。

entry.tran: (因受损、处理不当等)变形的，走样的
entry.def: If something is out of shape, it is no longer in its proper or original shape, for example because it has been damaged or wrongly handled.

example.ex: Once most wires are bent out of shape, they don't return to the original position.
example.tran: 大多数金属丝一旦弯曲变形就无法恢复原状。

entry.def: If you are out of shape, you are unhealthy and unable to do a lot of physical activity without getting tired.
If you say that things or people of a certain type come in all shapes and sizes, you mean that there are a large number of them, and that they are often very different from each other.

example.ex: Colleges and universities come in all shapes and sizes.
example.tran: 学院和大学林林总总，一应俱全。

entry.def: When something takes shape, it develops or starts to appear in such a way that it becomes fairly clear what its final form will be.

example.ex: In 1912 women's events were added, and the modern Olympic programme began to take shape.
example.tran: 1912 年增加了女子比赛项目，现代奥林匹克运动会开始初具雏形。

means.word_mean: 1. any spatial attributes (especially as defined by outline);

sentences.sentence: "he could barely make out their shapes through the smoke"

means.word_mean: 2. the spatial arrangement of something as distinct from its substance;

sentences.sentence: "geometry is the mathematical science of shape"

means.word_mean: 3. alternative names for the body of a human being;

sentences.sentence: "the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak"

means.word_mean: 4. a concrete representation of an otherwise nebulous concept;

sentences.sentence: "a circle was the embodiment of his concept of life"

means.word_mean: 5. the visual appearance of something or someone;
6. the state of (good) health (especially in the phrases `in condition' or `in shape' or `out of condition' or `out of shape')

sentences.sentence: "the composition presents problems for students of musical form"
"a visual pattern must include not only objects but the spaces between them"

means.word_mean: 1. shape or influence; give direction to;
2. make something, usually for a specific function;
3. give a shape or form to;

list.explanation: 非常生气的，十分烦恼的

example.en: Man, there is no reason to get so bent out of shape. I didn't mean any harm.
example.zh: 老兄,你没有理由要发这么大的火。我没有任何恶意。

example.en: I got bent out of shape because of maltreatment I received.
example.zh: 我因为受到了虐待而感到很气愤。

example.en: I was so bent out of shape I thought I'd never recover.
example.zh: 兴时我喝得烂醉如泥，以为自己永远也醍不过来了。

auth_sentence.content: Whip the cream until it just holds its shape.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whip the cream until it just holds its shape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whip the cream until it just holds its shape.

auth_sentence.content: Divide the mixture into four and shape into rounds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Divide the mixture into four and shape into rounds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Divide the mixture into four and shape into rounds.

auth_sentence.content: Shape the dough into a ball and flatten slightly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Shape the dough into a ball and flatten slightly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Shape the dough into a ball and flatten slightly.

Sentence.sentence: According to O'Sullivan culture also shapes the sorts of feelings we expect to have, and actually do experience, when in love.
But the teaching was shaped by our cultural imagines.
It shapes people's thinking and behavior.
They are a vital part of an array of data that we use to assess if we're doing well or doing badly, and that in turn shapes government policies and corporate budgets and personal spending decisions

The Home Depot approach to craftsmanship - simplify it, dumb it down, hire a contractor - is one signal that mastering tools and working with one's hands is receding in America as a hobby, as a valued skill, as a cultural influence that shaped thinking and behavior in vast sections of the country.

means.word_mean: 外形, 形状, 样子

sentences.en: They are uniform in size and shape.
sentences.cn: 它们的尺寸大小和形状都相同。

sentences.en: I made out two dim shapes in my dream.
sentences.cn: 我在梦中看到有两个模糊的影子。

sentences.en: The market has been in poor shape lately.
The children shaped the wet sand.
sentences.cn: 孩子们把湿沙子堆成各种形状。

means.word_mean: 对(某人或某事物)有重大影响; 决定(某事物)的性质

sentences.en: This dress is shaped at the waist and doesn't need a belt.
sentences.cn: 这件连衣裙腰部合身，不需要腰带。
刚来的那位这几天乖吗?

jushi.english: Strange shapes could be seen in the fog.
jushi.chinese: 在雾中可以看到一些奇怪的影子。

jushi.english: The picture is round in shape.
The shapes faded into the night.
jushi.chinese: 模糊的人影消失在夜色中。
